text: @WhiteHouse @Mike_Pence @realDonaldTrump In the meantime, COMRADE TRUMP is allowing tens of thousands of Americans to die of Coronavirus while he brags about how good a job he's doing. He is very good at causing American Deaths but he is impotent and incompetent as a leader. In fact he is incompetent as a person. LOSER!
